channel.title: Updates on Project RED
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Project RED

item.title: CAD Design Complete!
item.description: Hello Project RED supporters! Apologies that we have not issued a project update in a while, but we have been very busy with ventilator development!

item.title: Prototype Render
item.description: Hello Project Red supporters, we have a concept drawing of what we are planning for our ventilator design.

item.title: UI/UX Design
item.description: Hello Project Red supporters, we are making awesome progress on our ventilator design so I wanted to share another update!

item.title: FiO2 Mixing Demonstration
item.description: Hi all, today is a big milestone for our ventilator development.

item.title: PRVC Demonstration
item.description: OK we wanted to post another update showing a bit more about how our prototype ventilator is working.

item.title: Alpha Prototype
item.description: Our ventilator prototype has been up and breathing under software control for the past few days.

item.title: Concept
item.description: Our ventilator design is based on a high-speed blower which is capable of providing the pressure and flow necessary to ventilate a patient's lungs.
